TopicTitle: quick load saves before it loads.

Articles.Content:
like the title says, when you hit the quickload button it saves and names it something like 'quickload' THEN it loads the quicksave. this way if your like me and sometimes go days with out quick saving and then at 2am hit the quick load button and find yourself not even on the mun yet, you can just reload your save instead of throwing your computer out the window.

Edited August 26, 2016 by leviathan01

It's not clear to me what you mean here, so please correct me if I'm wrong, but I think you mean that when you press Quickload it saves the game immediately, as it is now, and then loads it again.

If that is correct then all it would mean is that when you are headed for 'imminent doom' and you hit Quickload it will save your current state and immediately reload and return you to your 'imminent doom', so all you actually do is delay your 'imminent doom' by the time it took to save and load again.

Which leads me to think I misunderstood your suggestion.
